references.paper_title: Encoder-decoder with atrous separable convolution for semantic image segmentation
references.reason: This paper is the primary method used for the segmentation experiments, which is a backbone of the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: On regularized losses for weakly-supervised CNN segmentation
references.reason: This paper provides the CRF loss used in the proposed approach, serving as a critical component of the framework.

references.paper_title: Single-stage semantic segmentation from image labels
references.reason: This paper is directly related to image-level supervision and serves as a key comparative method for demonstrating the improvement achieved by the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Seed, expand and constrain: Three principles for weakly-supervised image segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces concepts relevant to weakly-supervised learning and serves as a foundational reference in the field for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces ResNet, the backbone architecture used for several experiments in the proposed approach.
